name: Space Ace: Star Hunter
description:
--SPACE ACE: START HUNTER--

Speed around an obstacle course of an alien landscape full of Terramon to blow up, hazardous obstacles, Electro$, and special pickups giving you advanced abilities (i.e Giant Lazers!).

Try your best to make it to the end!

P.S keep an eye out for secrets and short cuts ;)

!!!!!!DISCLAIMER WARNING!!!!!! **This game features alot of flashing lights and colours, that CAN BE DANGEROUS may upset people with PHOTOSENSITIVE EPILEPSY.

This game is still in the process of development.

Contributions and donations go to the continued progress of this game, and, once finished will be available (FREE) across all platforms.

Thank you to all who play, enjoy, advise, contribute, or donate to this project.

Luke Holden

Mugen Inc Excecutive
